id.description: Unique identifier for your payments link in Asaas

value.description: Value of the payment link, if not informed, the payer can inform how much they want to pay

active.description: Determines whether the payments link is active

dueDateLimitDays.description: Number of business days that your customer can pay after the invoice is generated (For payment method such as Boleto)

subscriptionCycle.description: Billing frequency, if the chargeType is RECURRENT

maxInstallmentCount.description: Maximum number of installments that your customer can pay in installments for the payment link if the billing method selected is Installments. If not informed, the default value will be 1 installment

notificationEnabled.description: Defines whether customers registered via the payments link will have notifications enabled. If not informed, the default value will be true
